name: Renault Scenic 1.5 DCi 85 Expression Comfort 2003 Manual 5 doors specs
description:
Renault Scenic 1.5 DCi 85 Expression Comfort is a 2003 MPV model with 5 speed manual transmission.
    
With a power of 63 KW you can reach  0-100km h in just 14,6 seconds and a maximum speed of 168 km/h with an urban consumption of 6,2 l/100km.
The engine has a capacity of 1461 cc with 4, in line cylinders and 2 valves per cylinders.

Also this model has a weight of  with coil springs front suspension and a torsion bar rear suspension.
